note.p: Death: Shoe Lane Workhouse, London (02 January 1802)
Burial: St James's Church, Piccadilly, London

Career: Cadet, HEIC; Ensign (1780); Chief of a commission to visit Tibet, including an audience with the Tashi Lama (1783); at the siege of Seringapatum (1794); had a paralytic stroke whilst out walking, and was taken to the workhouse in Shoe Lane (21 December 1801)
